name: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Audio Archive
summary: Learn about .ZAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SOCOM is a series of third-person shooter video games published for the PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, and PlayStation Portable. The first three entries in the SOCOM series, released for the PlayStation 2, stored their audio files, including game sounds and music files, in ZAR archives.
Most players will never encounter a ZAR file. However, modders and other gaming enthusiasts sometimes extract ZAR files from SOCOM games, so they can extract, modify, and repackage their contents.

description: A ZAR file is an archive used by the PlayStation 2 entries in the SOCOM video game series. It contains audio files used in the game, including the game's soundtrack. SOCOM U.S. Navy SEALs, SOCOM II, and SOCOM 3 all use ZAR archives.

instructions: You can use the player-created SOCOM Archive Manager or PSound utilities to extract the audio files a ZAR file contains.
